subject: World Cup 2014 (Soccer)
Soccer
lead_paragraph: FIFA has selected the dates for the 2014 World Cup in Brazil. The tournament involving 32 countries will be held from June 12 to July 13, 2014.
snippet: FIFA has selected the dates for the 2014 World Cup in Brazil. The tournament involving 32 countries will be held from June 12 to July 13, 2014.
